message: Let's start fair.  I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  It's a good starting point.
Alice, your offer was a bit too much in your favor.  Let's be more realistic. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor.  It reflects the fact that I have more to lose from inflation in the next round.
I think it's time we compromise.  Inflation is affecting us both, so let's split the money evenly.  This is the fairest way to avoid further losses.
